original_text: Jesus then said, ‘You should be like a wise servant. Be someone that the master can trust. The master will choose a man like that. He will say to him, “Rule over my house and all my other servants. Give everyone their food to eat at the right time.”
korean_text: 충성되고 지혜 있는 종이 되어 주인에게 그 집 사람들을 맡아 때를 따라 양식을 나눠 줄 자가 누구냐

sentences.original_text: You should be like a wise servant
Be someone that the master can trust
sentences.korean_translation: 주인이 신뢰할 수 있는 사람이 되라

sentences.original_text: The master will choose a man like that

sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나의 다른 모든 종들을 다스리라

sentences.original_text: Give everyone their food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 사람에게 그들이 먹을 음식을 주라
